commands.fullCommand: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll serve --host 0.0.0.0 --port 4000 --baseurl /TVx
commands.context: Starts local Jekyll documentation server with live reload

commands.fullCommand: cd docs && bundle exec jekyll build
commands.context: Builds static documentation site to _site/ directory
Starts Vite development server on localhost:5173
Builds production-ready React app with Vite

commands.fullCommand: docker build -t tvx:latest . && docker rm -f tvx && docker run -d --name tvx -p 8777:80 -e VITE_M3U_URL=http://your-server:8000/api/channels.m3u -e VITE_XMLTV_URL=http://your-server:8000/api/xmltv.xml tvx:latest
commands.context: Builds Docker image and runs container with environment variables
Follow Docker container logs in real-time for debugging
Runs ESLint to check TypeScript/React code quality
Installs Node.js project dependencies from package.json
Installs Ruby gems for Jekyll documentation server
Follow Docker Compose container logs for debugging
